text: Transcription factor DNA - binding analysis ( TF-ELISA ) .

<extra_id_0> CREB-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> ATF-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA - binding activity was analyzed with the TransFactor Profiling ( Inflammation 1 ) Kit ( BD Biosciences ) according to the manufacturer 's protocol .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Binding binding <extra_id_0> Theme ATF-2 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Binding binding <extra_id_0> Theme CREB-1 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: Nuclear extracts were prepared from HEK 293T cells transfected with a control vector ( EGFP ) or <extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression vector ( 1 , 000 ng ) in the presence or absence of forskolin ( 10 muM for 4 h ) using the TransFactor Extraction Kit ( BD Biosciences ) .
Protein concentration was determined using a Biophotometer ( Eppendorf , Hamburg , Germany ) .
Nuclear extracts ( 20 mug ) were incubated in preblocked wells containing plate - bound double-stranded oligonucleotides corresponding to an ATF / CREB consensus sequence ( emTGACATCAem ) .
Wells were washed , incubated with the appropriate primary antibody , washed , incubated with secondary antibody ( HRP-labeled ) , washed again , and finally developed with TMB substrate .
Colorimetric reactions were read using a VersaMax microplate reader ( Molecular Devices ) at an absorbance of 655 nm .
